personal.name: Md. Toufiqul Islam
personal.title: Software Engineer | Node.js, Golang, Docker, Kubernetes

about.title: //about
about.content: Hi, I’m Md. Toufiqul Islam, a software engineer with 6 years of professional experience working in high volume and fast paced environments. Skilled in creating scalable and impactful products using variety of technologies including Node.js, Go and kubernetes & PostgresSQL. I’m passionate about creating robust systems, mentoring engineers, and optimizing performance at scale. I’d love to contribute to impactful projects where I can apply my technical expertise and leadership skills.

jobs.description: JIAK is a Singapore-based SaaS startup modernizing the F&B industry with an all-in-one platform for reservations, digital ordering, POS, and analytics—helping restaurants streamline operations and grow through smarter tech.
achievements: Owned the end-to-end development of core merchant services, including Digital Menu Management, a real-time Waitlist Queuing system, and automated merchant-facing Notifications
Developed the core public-facing RESTful API to power the customer reservation platform, building foundational features for restaurant discovery and real-time table booking

Executed a strategic refactoring of a legacy codebase, establishing clearer design patterns that improved code
reusability and accelerated the pace of future feature development

Implemented an asynchronous job queue using Redis and BullMQ to reliably offload background tasks, such as
sending Twilio notifications, which improved API response times

Partnered with frontend and design teams to define clear API contracts, ensuring seamless data integration and a
consistent user experience across the platform

jobs.description: 10 Minute School is Bangladesh's largest online learning platform, offering free classes, tutorials, and quizzes for students (grades 1–12), university admissions, and skill development.
achievements: Promoted through Software Engineer and Senior Software Engineer to Lead for consistent high performance and leadership
Rearchitected the caching strategy for the critical Central Routine API, slashing peak-hour p99 latency by over 85% to ensure a reliable user experience under high load

Led Live Video Streaming infrastructure for conducting live classes with real-time interactions. Serves around 30k students participating in different live classes and handling approximately 100k RPM during peak hours every day
Architected and deployed an in-house Video Processing Pipeline, reducing monthly operational costs by 75% while processing over 800 videos
Reduced cloud infrastructure costs by 60% through strategic optimization initiatives
Led a sub-team to develop central Learning Report service that improved user engagement by providing comprehensive weekly and monthly reports
Led end-to-end implementation of OpenTelemetry across microservices that enhanced system monitoring capabilities
Developed REST API for different microservices of 10MS Billing System, handling 10k+ transactions every day
Designed and led the development of an automated push notification system using event-driven Microservice Architecture
Implemented REST API for Exam Service, resulting in onboarding 140k new users
Collaborated with cross functional teams to design, develop, and deploy features to production
Monitored post-production feature performance to identify and implement further optimization strategies
Mentored junior engineers & interns to build production ready services
Integrated AWS tools like S3, SNS, SQS and Lambda with the application

jobs.description: Khamar-e is an agri-tech startup working towards a data-driven farming and supply chain ecosystem in Bangladesh
achievements: Developed front-end & back-end of a Health Tracker IOT device for tracking the activity of cattle

projects.name: Video Touch
achievements: Implemented video transcoding and thumbnail generation with an asynchronous job queue
Streamed videos on demand (VOD) using a Content Delivery Network (CDN) for optimized performance
Developed a user-friendly dashboard with Next.js and shadcn/ui for a seamless user experience

projects.name: Deploybl
achievements: Full-Stack application to simplify the deployment and management of applications
Deploy any application written in any language with just two clicks. No need to buy and configure a server
Automatic unique URL generation for each deployed application. No need to buy and configure domain
